title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 444.13 - Operating revenue-deductions from revenue
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 444.13 - Operating revenue-deductions from revenue

State Regulations
[3215]
This group of accounts (5900 -
5990) is used to report reductions in gross revenue arising from bad debts, contractual adjustments, uncompensated care, administrative, courtesy, policy
discounts, and adjustments and other revenue deductions. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
444.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
